content.question: Which of the following affected the status of women during the Reformation?

choices.label: The suppression of nunneries and the institution of a married clergy
Papal agreement allowing the ordination of women
Permission from secular rulers permitting women to own property
The abolition of primogeniture and the institution of equal inheritance for men and women
The establishment of equal access to education for men and women

content.answer: The suppression of nunneries and the institution of a married clergy

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
